Name: Barrel Blast
About the game: Barrel Blast is an ode to the past, drenched in nostalgia, featuring old school and awesome gameplay mechanics. Barrel Blast takes the cannon mechanic to the most extreme and highest levels! Time your shots, bounce off of objects, fling through gravity holes, fight enemies, glide through rings, hit targets, and soar through the air like a superhero! A familiar three-star rank system allows you to complete levels at your own pace and move on without perfection or retry until you get it perfect each time! -Over 200 levels of creative level design -3 stylish playable characters -5 fun and different gameplay modes -Full PC options menu and settings -Full controller support -Track your progress against friends with Leaderboards
